abstract: Iraqi militants conduct series of suicide bombings of Shiite mosques, killing at least 22 worshipers; while no group has claimed responsibility, attacks bear hallmarks of those carried out by Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Militants in Iraq carried out a series of suicide attacks on Friday, hitting Shiite mosques in the country’s northeast and killing at least 22 worshipers.

headline.main: Iraq: Bombings Kill 22 at Shiite Mosques
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iraq: Bombings Kill 22 at Shiite Mosques

snippet: Militants in Iraq carried out a series of suicide attacks on Friday, hitting Shiite mosques in the country’s northeast and killing at least 22 worshipers.
